text:
Valeri Bganba (born 26 August 1953) is an Abkhazian politician. He is a former Speaker of the People's Assembly of Abkhazia. He was elected as speaker on 3 April 2012 and was replaced by Valery Kvarchia on 12 April 2017.
Bganba became acting President on 1 June 2014, after the resignation of Alexander Ankvab. On 25 September 2014 he was replaced by Raul Khajimba, the winner of the presidential elections on 24 August.
In September 2018, he became the 13th Prime Minister of Abkhazia.

annotations.surface_form: Speaker of the People's Assembly of Abkhazia
